steps.title: Applications list
steps.content:
Applications you are authorized to access are displayed here.

Note: if no applications are displayed you probably have currently no rights on any authorizations.

steps.title: Application search
steps.content: If you have multiple applications and search a specific one, you can use the search-box in order to limit displayed results.

steps.title: Create new application
steps.content: To create a new application click here.

steps.title: Create new application
steps.content:
Enter here the name of your new application.

Note: Name must be unique in Alien 4 Cloud.

steps.title: Create new application
steps.content: Enter here the description of the application (you can also change it later on).

steps.title: Create new application
steps.content:
You can use the selector to choose a topology template in order to bootstrap your application with an initial topology that you will be able to update later.

Topology templates are created globally by users having the 'Architect' role.

steps.title: Create new application
steps.content: In order to finally create the new application click here.

steps.title: Create new application
steps.content: Or cancel creation process by clicking here.
